Today is our final home game before embarking on a six-game road trip. We won't play at T-Mobile Arena again until November 10. #VegasBorn

caption: nhl.com
description: The latest news, analysis and stories from NHL.com, the official site of the National Hockey League
message:
The month of October has run the gamut of emotions for the people of Las Vegas. From tragedy and heartbreak, to the inexplicable start to the Golden Knights' first season.

In a heartfelt article for The Players' Tribune, longtime Vegas resident Deryk Engelland writes what this has been like for players on the Golden Knights. #VegasBorn
name: Vegas Golden Knights

message: Tomas Nosek's goal gave us a lead and we never relinquished it as we set a franchise record for most consecutive wins (4) in team history. #VegasBorn
